summary:
Experienced Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the Logistics and the Heavy Lifting and Transport Industry. Skilled in Project Management, Contract Management and Operations Management in a technical environment.

Raymond have been an International Project Manager with Mammoet for more than 6 years, having extensive knowledge of managing heavy lifting and heavy transporting projects in an international environment.
